previewArticle.title: FC Dallas vs. Seattle Sounders | MLS Cup Playoffs Preview

recapArticle.title: FC Dallas 1, Seattle Sounders 1 | MLS Cup Playoffs Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: The Sounders and FC Dallas are underway in Toyota Stadium.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: FC Dallas vs. Seattle Sounders

timelineItems.name: Andrew Miller
timelineItems.text: @clint_dempsey warming up. #DALvSEA @SoundersFC http://t.co/BSSx2msNnM

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: And the #MLSPlayoffs beat goes on. Watch #DALvSEA now on ESPN2! https://t.co/F26DNNaXsW

timelineItems.name: mango39
timelineItems.text: #FCDallas #RedSunday @FCDallas

timelineItems.name: Sounders Matchday
timelineItems.text: WE ARE SO CLOSE TO KICKOFFFFFFF!!! #DALvSEA

timelineItems.name: Elmer Polanco
timelineItems.text: Via @FCDallas: The scarves are up. LET'S. DO. THIS. #RedForGlory #DTID http://t.co/hUDH0jiklU

timelineItems.name: Paul Watts
timelineItems.text: Quick dress change: out of my #Seahawks jersey and into my #Sounders one. Go Seattle! #DALvSEA

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Jeremiah Oshan
timelineItems.text: That @AlexiLalas actually understated Sounders’ late-game play. They netted 17 points on goals after the 80th minute.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Marco Pappa (Seattle Sounders FC) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Obafemi Martins.

timelineItems.name: Laura Louis
timelineItems.text: The view is not too shabby. 👌⚽️#3rdrow ##DTID #fcdallas #sundayfunday #soccerknockers #soccer4life #win #datenight

timelineItems.name: Kevin Lindstrom
timelineItems.text: Hands down best playoff crowd I have seen in Frisco. @ToyotaStadiumTX @FCDallas

timelineItems.name: Mark
timelineItems.text: Sunday Funday. #FCdallas vs #SeattleSounders

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  FC Dallas. Conceded by Chad Marshall.

timelineItems.name: Víctor A. Morales
timelineItems.text: #FCDallas putting pressure. Attacking the open space and creating chances against a rare #Sounders defense.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Obafemi Martins (Seattle Sounders FC).
Zach Loyd (FC Dallas) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Eric Hole
timelineItems.text: Blas Perez and Fabian Castillo are scary to watch in open space. #DALvSEA #DALvSEA

timelineItems.name: Chris Swenson
timelineItems.text: Well, that's one more shot than we had the entire first half last week. #FCDvSEA #SoundersFC

timelineItems.name: Matt Minnich
timelineItems.text: When I root, I root for whoever is playing Seattle! #FCDallas #MLSPlayoffs #DALvSEA

timelineItems.name: David Ulloa
timelineItems.text: Weird to see #Sounders not attacking letting other team dictate #DALvSEA first 10 min Dempsey and martins haven't even touched the ball

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Michel (FC Dallas).
Clint Dempsey (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Fabian Castillo (FC Dallas).
Zach Scott (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Obafemi Martins (Seattle Sounders FC) right footed shot from the center of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Raul Fernandez stonewalls Obafemi Martins from point blank range.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Obafemi Martins (Seattle Sounders FC) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Brad Evans with a headed pass.

timelineItems.name: David Anderson
timelineItems.text: #DALvSEA #MLSPlayoffs "My purgatory is driving 2,200 miles with @AlexiLalas" @TaylorTwellman love it.

timelineItems.name: Drew Epperley
timelineItems.text: Hernandez has to be careful with those two-footed challenges. #FCDallas

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Osvaldo Alonso (Seattle Sounders FC) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Brad Evans.

timelineItems.name: Kevin Lindstrom
timelineItems.text: That was kinda big there, Raul.

timelineItems.comment: Obafemi Martins (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Moises Hernandez (FC Dallas).

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: .@AlexiLalas' beard game...very strong. #DALvSEA http://t.co/vilMFkhnL0

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Obafemi Martins (Seattle Sounders FC).
Matt Hedges (FC Dallas) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Clint Dempsey (Seattle Sounders FC) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Clint Dempsey cracks a shot from distance

timelineItems.name: Spencer
timelineItems.text: Sounders can't connect passes, Dallas crowding the ball like seven year olds. Ugly game so far. #DALvSEA

timelineItems.name: Alexi Lalas
timelineItems.text: Yedlin just did something quietly incredible. #DALvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, FC Dallas 1, Seattle Sounders FC 1.

timelineItems.name: GO VOTE NOV 4
timelineItems.text: See you next season fc dallas unless you somehow kick ass in Seattle but even if you don't I love y'all to death #dtid

timelineItems.name: Ari Liljenwall
timelineItems.text: And that's your ballgame. Seattle ties Dallas 1-1. Big result.

timelineItems.name: Bobby Drown
timelineItems.text: That's neat. Well done fellas #EBFG #HellaGreedy

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: Alonso away goal gives @SoundersFC a 1-1 draw in Dallas: http://t.co/JszaJj0T3X #DALvSEA http://t.co/HRvpLjOijJ

timelineItems.desc: Supporters' Shield winners Seattle Sounders FC make their MLS Cup Playoffs 2014 presented by AT&T debut when they meet Knockout Round winner FC Dallas in the first leg of their Western Conference Semifinal Series at Toyota Stadium.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: FC Dallas vs. Seattle Sounders | November 2, 2014

timelineItems.desc:
MLSsoccer.com's Katie Witham and Greg Lalas recap FC Dallas' 1-1 draw with the Seattle Sounders in leg one of their Western conference semifinal. 

For more coverage of the 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs, presented by AT&T visit: http://www.mlssoccer.com/mlscup/2014
timelineItems.title: FC Dallas vs Seattle Sounders Leg One Recap | 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs

timelineItems.desc:
Former Montreal Impact Head Coach Jesse Marsch and the Philadelphia Union's Maurice Edu, aka "J-Mo," take a look at how Seattle slowed down FC Dallas' speedy attackers. 

For more coverage of the 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs, presented by AT&T visit: http://www.mlssoccer.com/mlscup/2014
timelineItems.title: Jesse Marsch and Maurice Edu Analyze Seattle’s suffocating defense | 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs

timelineItems.comment: Blas Pérez (FC Dallas) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by DeAndre Yedlin (Seattle Sounders FC).
Attempt saved. Clint Dempsey (Seattle Sounders FC) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Obafemi Martins.

timelineItems.name: Jordan Wiebe
timelineItems.text: Sigi Schmid looks like a guy who could recommend a really solid used bookstore. #DALvSEA

timelineItems.name: MLSApologist
timelineItems.text: What bet did Raul lose to warrant that haircut? #DALvSEA

timelineItems.name: Zack Spear
timelineItems.text: Whomever decided on the @SoundersFC wearing green tonight definitely isn't color blind. #DALvSEA I'm looking at the socks.

timelineItems.name: Karl Picard
timelineItems.text: This game is really stressing me out. @LIVESounders #dalvsea

timelineItems.name: Warren Abao
timelineItems.text: With #FCDallas somewhat reliant on speed and counterattack for success, it's kinda scary that the Sounders players are faster #DALvSEA

timelineItems.name: Monica Alvarado
timelineItems.text: FC Dallas vs Sounders game!! #DTID http://t.co/eiXKEsQe0s

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Clint Dempsey (Seattle Sounders FC).

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: The speed on the near sideline between Yedlin and Castillo might just be the most pace we've ever seen on a single #MLS wing ever. #DALvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Marco Pappa (Seattle Sounders FC).
Je-Vaughn Watson (FC Dallas) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Marco Buzzard
timelineItems.text: DUWAMISH SOWN! SEATTLE'S OWN! SOUNDERS FC! CASCADES TO SEA! #EBFG

timelineItems.name: Chris
timelineItems.text: Scarves up Seattle! Sounders dog has her game face on and is ready to cheer for @SoundersFC #MLSPlayoffs #DALvSEA http://t.co/uRBFyXTr8E

timelineItems.name: 50StarsSoccer
timelineItems.text: This game should be pretty open. Wings are filled with speed and offensive minded players. #DALvSEA #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: MassiveCity
timelineItems.text: .@AlexiLalas just invented the "Seattle perfected everything" meme. #DALvSEA #MLS

timelineItems.desc: Penalty conceded by Marco Pappa (Seattle Sounders FC) after a foul in the penalty area.
timelineItems.title: PENALTY: Marco Pappa chops down Andrés Escobar in the box

timelineItems.name: Kevin Koczwara
timelineItems.text: "Who can kick it higher?" Is not the name of this game. #DALvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Penalty FC Dallas. Andrés Escobar draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by Marco Pappa (Seattle Sounders FC) after a foul in the penalty area.

timelineItems.name: Megan Myers
timelineItems.text: It needs to be half time soon. I need to get food so I can stress eat. #DALvSEA

timelineItems.name: benjagain
timelineItems.text: I'll give FC Dallas that: it was a mistake from Seattle, but Dallas pushed em to it. Right call. #DALvSEA

timelineItems.name: Dale Coleman
timelineItems.text: Pappa giveth and Pappa taketh away. #DALvSEA #EBFG

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  FC Dallas 1, Seattle Sounders FC 0. Michel (FC Dallas) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: PK GOAL: Michel pops the PK past Stefan Frei

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: won't be any controversy about that PK call #DALvSEA #MLS

timelineItems.name: Ben Baer
timelineItems.text: FC Dallas score a goal on their first shot. #DALvSEA

timelineItems.name: Bryan Columbus
timelineItems.text: Dumb. Dumb. Dumb. Dumb. #DALvSEA

timelineItems.name: Dub
timelineItems.text: I like penalties. #DTID

timelineItems.name: benjagain
timelineItems.text: Waiting for Yedlin to get to the ball before Michel. #DALvSEA

timelineItems.name: Josh Holloway
timelineItems.text: Sorry Marco, but why did you leave your feet? No need for that at all. #DALvSEA

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: As great as Pappa has been this year, that was such a horrible, horrendous, challenge. The opposite of smart. #DALvSEA

timelineItems.name: e-Spurs USA
timelineItems.text: Goal should be called off however due Michel's awful attempt at a nae nae #DALvSEA

timelineItems.desc:
Jason Saghini and Andrew Wiebe break down the Western Conference Semifinal Leg 1 clash between FC Dallas and the Seattle Sounders.

Which team will win this match? PLAY MLS CUP PICK'EM: http://bracket.mlssoccer.com/picks

For more coverage of the 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs, presented by AT&T visit: http://www.mlssoccer.com/mlscup/2014
timelineItems.title: FC Dallas vs. Seattle Sounders Preview | 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs presented by AT&T

timelineItems.name: Matt Pollard
timelineItems.text: Alright Seattle, you want the hype, the pressure, the spotlight, and the target on your back from the double, here you go. #DALvSEA

timelineItems.name: Jeremy Mikula
timelineItems.text: Strong defending was never Pappa's strength at #cf97 either. Did well initially, but bought a simple fake by Escobar #DALvSEA #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Eric Hole
timelineItems.text: And now, the bus will be parked and the middle of the pitch will be clogged. #DALvSEA #GoSounders

timelineItems.name: Scott Cannon
timelineItems.text: Id like to see 2 challenges per team per game. If you lose challenge, you lose a sub. If out of subs, take a player off the field. #DALvSEA

timelineItems.text: #FCDallas is finding some early pockets behind the Seattle defense.

timelineItems.text: Yeah great crowd out for @FCDallas #DTID #RedForGlory #RedSunday http://t.co/bD7CfIy2ZD

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Leonardo González (Seattle Sounders FC).
Fabian Castillo (FC Dallas) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.desc: Offside, Seattle Sounders FC. Obafemi Martins tries a through ball, but Clint Dempsey is caught offside.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Clint Dempsey starts a scramble in the box but is whistled for offsides.

timelineItems.name: Ryan Brister
timelineItems.text: These teams have kinda nullified each other tonight, no? #DALvSEA

timelineItems.name: John Piombo
timelineItems.text: I can see SEA slowing things down, but DAL needs to show some urgency #DALvSEA

timelineItems.name: Charles Boehm
timelineItems.text: Still annoyed that Diaz is suspended (dodgily) for this one. #DALvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Micheal Azira (Seattle Sounders FC) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Attempt blocked. Obafemi Martins (Seattle Sounders FC) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Offside, Seattle Sounders FC. Obafemi Martins tries a through ball, but Clint Dempsey is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: FC Dallas refuses to play wide. Seattle compact in the middle and at the back. #DALvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Clint Dempsey (Seattle Sounders FC) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Obafemi Martins.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Holt
timelineItems.text: Texeira has 4 goals in his career. 3 vs. Seattle. #SoundersKiller #DALvSEA #RedForGlory

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  FC Dallas. Conceded by Leonardo González.

timelineItems.name: Jay Weidenbach
timelineItems.text: A little bit chilly tonight. #FCDallas #DTID http://t.co/VUtsx2dX97

timelineItems.name: Matt Pollard
timelineItems.text: Dallas isn't showing any indication of being able to score. They'll need to be better at finishing to win this series. #DALvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Clint Dempsey (Seattle Sounders FC).
Matt Hedges (FC Dallas) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Fabian Castillo (FC Dallas) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the top right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Stefan Frei makes a game saving leap to stop Castillo’s late blast

timelineItems.name: Clay Massey
timelineItems.text: This is how bad do you want a goal, but how bad do you want to not concede another for #FCDallas

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Leonardo González (Seattle Sounders FC).
Andrés Escobar (FC Dallas) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Marco Pappa (Seattle Sounders FC) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Raul Fernandez wraps up an early strike from Marco Pappa

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Fabian Castillo (FC Dallas) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Victor Ulloa.
Corner,  FC Dallas. Conceded by Stefan Frei.

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: Loyd has dominated Dempsey today much as Marshall/Scott silenced Perez - great game for central defenders #DALvSEA #MLS

timelineItems.name: Jason Robertson
timelineItems.text: Noone ever say anything bad about Frei again #soundersfc #EBFG

timelineItems.name: Andrew Wiebe
timelineItems.text: Said it in the #DALvSEA preview. Don't expect Castillo to consistently create for others. His skill is getting his own shot.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: What. A. Save. Stefan Frei, ladies & gents. #DALvSEA

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, FC Dallas 1, Seattle Sounders FC 1.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Angel Dirk Hazard Alaniz
timelineItems.text: pretty good seats too! #fcdallas #mls #seattlesounders #playoffs

timelineItems.name: FC Dallas
timelineItems.text: Speed kills. #Fabi http://t.co/NziZ9rVZOH

timelineItems.name: Zach Mills
timelineItems.text: Only game I really care about tonight: @SoundersFC playoff game! Can not wait. #DALvSEA #MLSCup #MLSPlayoffs #herecomestreble

timelineItems.name: David Hernandez
timelineItems.text: #fcdallas vs #seattlesounders #playoffs #red #toyotastadium #dtid  lets win this!
